Attribute.Name: Super Strength
Attribute.Description: Choosing this as a Characteristic Focus will cause your Strength to increase as you level. It will also increase the efficacy of your powers based on your total Strength. This is in addition to the natural boost Strength provides to melee attacks.

Attribute.Name: Super Dexterity
Attribute.Description: Choosing this as a Characteristic Focus will cause your Dexterity to increase as you level. It will also increase the efficacy of your powers based on your total Dexterity.

Attribute.Name: Super Constitution
Attribute.Description: Choosing this as a Characteristic Focus will cause your Constitution to increase as you level. It will also increase the efficacy of your powers based on your total Constitution.

Attribute.Name: Super Intelligence
Attribute.Description: Choosing this as a Characteristic Focus will cause your Intelligence to increase as you level. It will also increase the efficacy of your powers based on your total Intelligence.

Attribute.Name: Super Ego
Attribute.Description: Choosing this as a Characteristic Focus will cause your Ego to increase as you level. It will also increase the efficacy of your powers based on your total Ego.

Attribute.Name: Super Presence
Attribute.Description: Choosing this as a Characteristic Focus will cause your Presence to increase as you level. It will also increase the efficacy of your powers based on your total Presence.

Attribute.Name: Super Recovery
Attribute.Description: Choosing this as a Characteristic Focus will cause your Recovery to increase as you level. It will also increase the efficacy of your powers based on your total Recovery.

Attribute.Name: Super Endurance
Attribute.Description: Choosing this as a Characteristic Focus will cause your Endurance to increase as you level. It will also increase the efficacy of your powers based on your total Endurance.

Attribute.Name: The Hero
Attribute.Description: The picture of balanced perfection, this character is the Jack-of-All-Trades, master of none, though often better than the master of one.

Attribute.Name: Electric Potential
Attribute.Description: This is the innate characteristic for electricity.

Attribute.Name: Incandescent
Attribute.Description: This is the innate characteristic for fire.

Attribute.Name: Impetus
Attribute.Description: This is the innate characteristic for force.

Attribute.Name: Absolute Zero
Attribute.Description: This is the innate characteristic for ice.

Attribute.Name: Sureshot
Attribute.Description: This is the innate characteristic for archery.

Attribute.Name: Technological Intuition
Attribute.Description: This is the innate characteristic for gadgeteering.

Attribute.Name: Quick Trigger
Attribute.Description: This is the innate characteristic for munitions.

Attribute.Name: Mechanized
Attribute.Description: This is the innate characteristic for power armor.

Attribute.Name: One of Mind and Body
Attribute.Description: This is the innate characteristic for martial arts.

Attribute.Name: Matter Manipulator
Attribute.Description: This is the innate characteristic for telekinesis.

Attribute.Name: Mind Reader
Attribute.Description: This is the innate characteristic for telepathy.

Attribute.Name: Superhuman
Attribute.Description: This is the innate characteristic for might.

Attribute.Name: Abyssal
Attribute.Description: This is the innate characteristic for darkness.

Attribute.Name: Arcanus
Attribute.Description: This is the innate characteristic for sorcery.

Attribute.Name: Inhuman
Attribute.Description: This is the innate characteristic for supernatural.

Attribute.Name: Divinity
Attribute.Description: This is the innate characteristic for Celestial.

Attribute.Name: Feral
Attribute.Description: This is the innate characteristic for Bestial Supernatural.

Attribute.Name: Mighty
Attribute.Description: Intense training has increased your strength to the limit of your race or species.

Attribute.Name: Agile
Attribute.Description: Intense training has increased your agility to the limit of your race or species.

Attribute.Name: Enduring
Attribute.Description: Intense training has increased your endurance to the limit of your race or species.

Attribute.Name: Brilliant
Attribute.Description: Intense study has increased your intellect to its theoretical limit.

Attribute.Name: Indomitable
Attribute.Description: Intense training has increased your fortitude to the limit of your race or species.

Attribute.Name: Intimidating
Attribute.Description: Intense training has increased your presence to the limit of your race or species.

Attribute.Name: Tireless
Attribute.Description: Intense training has increased your persistence to the limit of your race or species.

Attribute.Name: Energetic
Attribute.Description: Intense training has increased your energy to the limit of your race or species.

Attribute.Name: Martial Focus
Attribute.Description: You've spent many hours training and have reached a high level of martial ability.

Attribute.Name: Physical Conditioning
Attribute.Description: You have achieved a level of fitness that is the envy of all.

Attribute.Name: Body and Mind
Attribute.Description: You have used both mental and physical workouts to develop incredible strength of body and mind!

Attribute.Name: Professional Athlete
Attribute.Description: Your competitive nature has led you to become a star athlete in your preferred sport.

Attribute.Name: Impressive Physique
Attribute.Description: Your efforts have paid off and your physique is a sight to behold!

Attribute.Name: Relentless
Attribute.Description: With your eye on your goal, there is nothing in the world that can stop you from getting there.

Attribute.Name: Bodybuilder
Attribute.Description: Your time at the gym has paid off, and you have toned your body to near perfection!

Attribute.Name: Acrobat
Attribute.Description: You've become adept at performing amazing feats of balance, agility, and motor-coordination.

Attribute.Name: Coordinated
Attribute.Description: You're able to keep multiple things going at once with little trouble.

Attribute.Name: Shooter
Attribute.Description: You've been practicing your marksmanship, and your aim is now impeccable.

Attribute.Name: Finesse
Attribute.Description: You have an amazing ability for working with delicate things.

Attribute.Name: Impresario
Attribute.Description: You're quite the showman and excel at providing entertainment for those around you.

Attribute.Name: Accurate
Attribute.Description: Your aim is impeccable and never misses your target.

Attribute.Name: Healthy Mind
Attribute.Description: Your mind is always sharp and ready for the next challenge.

Attribute.Name: Ascetic
Attribute.Description: Through meditation you have achieved harmony between body and soul.

Attribute.Name: Shrug it Off
Attribute.Description: Discomfort and injury are nothing to you. Rub some dirt in it and keep going!

Attribute.Name: Quick Recovery
Attribute.Description: While other people are collapsed on the ground, you're ready to go another round.

Attribute.Name: Boundless Reserves
Attribute.Description: No matter how many times you have to dig deep to come up with a win, you always have it in you.

Attribute.Name: Academics
Attribute.Description: Your scholarly time has been well spent and you have a wide range of knowledge.

Attribute.Name: Diplomatic
Attribute.Description: You're mastered the fine art of saying exactly what everyone wants to hear, without saying anything at all.

Attribute.Name: Negotiator
Attribute.Description: You've mastered the art of the deal, whether it is talking down a criminal or just getting a burger.

Attribute.Name: Investigator
Attribute.Description: Little escapes your notice and the details always seem to fall into place.

Attribute.Name: Showmanship
Attribute.Description: You have a flair for the dramatic and are often the center of attention.

Attribute.Name: Worldly
Attribute.Description: Your journeys have taken you around the globe and made you worldly and wise.

Attribute.Name: Daredevil
Attribute.Description: Certainly of death? Small chance of success? No big deal!

Attribute.Name: Lasting Impression
Attribute.Description: After meeting you once, everyone always remembers who you are.

Attribute.Name: Prodigy
Attribute.Description: These things just come natually to you, it's not your fault you're better than everyone else.

Attribute.Name: Amazing Stamina
Attribute.Description: You're able to keep going long after everyone else has collapsed.

Attribute.Name: Covert Ops Training
Attribute.Description: You've undergone an aggressive regimen of training and are prepared to defend against threats wherever they strike, anywhere, anytime.

Attribute.Name: Martial Training
Attribute.Description: The wise masters you have trained with have helped you gain wisdom, find balance between body and mind, and have taught you valuable martial arts techniques.

Attribute.Name: Paramilitary Training
Attribute.Description: Sometimes to achieve peace, you have to learn the art of war. Therefore, you have undergone an exhaustive regiment of military training.

Attribute.Name: Discipline Training
Attribute.Description: You have a will of iron and are always in control of your senses and actions.

Attribute.Name: Sniper Training
Attribute.Description: You are well trained in the art of stalking your target and taking it out without anyone knowing you're there.

Attribute.Name: Command Training
Attribute.Description: You have extensive training in how to manage groups of people.

Attribute.Name: Survival Training
Attribute.Description: You always know what needs to be done to make it out of a situation in one piece.

Attribute.Name: Field Ops Training
Attribute.Description: Being deprived of your base of operations is no problem for you.

Attribute.Name: Jack of All Trades
Attribute.Description: You're good at everything you attempt and most of the things you don't.

Power.Name: Flight
Power.Description:
Travel
Targets Self
0-1.5 sec

Travel Power

The quintessential superhero power, flight allows you to soar through the air.

TAP

  • Grants flight
  • Greatest maneuverability of any flight power
  • While out of combat, flight speed gradually increases over several stages
  • While in combat, flight speed is reduced
  • While active, the energy cost of all powers is increased

CHARGE

  • When fully charged you enter flight at maximum flight speed.

Power.Name: Superjump
Power.Description:
Travel
Targets Self
0-1.5 sec

Travel Power

Able to leap tall buildings and enormous distances in a single bound!

TAP

  • Greatly increases jump height and the speed you move while jumping
  • While out of combat, jump height and speed will increase over several stages
  • While in combat, your jump height and speed are reduced
  • While active, the energy cost of all powers is increased

CHARGE

  • When fully charged, this power activates at maximum jump height and speed

Advantage.Name: Rebounding Resilience
Advantage.Description: While Superjump is active, holds are more difficult to land on you.

Power.Name: Superspeed
Power.Description:
Travel
Targets Self
0-1.5 sec

Travel Power

Faster than a speeding bullet isn't just a metaphor in your case.

TAP

  • Greatly increases your run speed
  • While out of combat, your run speed will increase over several stages
  • While in combat, your run speed is reduced, but still greater than the default run speed
  • While active, the energy cost of all powers is increased

CHARGE

  • When fully charged, superspeed activates at maximum run speed

Advantage.Name: Impact
Advantage.Description: While Superspeed is active, you gain a damage bonus which scales with your current speed. This bonus persists for a short time upon losing speed or stopping.

Power.Name: Acrobatics
Power.Description:
Travel
Targets Self
0-1.5 sec

Travel Power

Your natural physical gifts allow you to move in ways and at speeds most people wouldn't dream of.

TAP

  • Increases run speed, jump height, and the speed you move while jumping
  • While out of combat, your run speed, jump height, and jump speed will increase over several stages
  • The run speed, jump height, and jump speed granted are not as large as the run speed granted by Superspeed or the jump height and jump seed granted by Superjump
  • While in combat, your run speed, jump height and jump speed are reduced
  • While active, the energy cost of all powers is increased

CHARGE

  • When fully charged, acrobatics activates at maximum run speed

Advantage.Name: Versatility
Advantage.Description: While Acrobatics is active, if you take damage you will receive a stack of Versatility, up to 5 stacks. Versatility increases your movement speed for a short time.

Power.Name: Teleportation
Power.Description:
Travel
Targets Self
lasts up to 5 sec

Travel Power

By phasing yourself out of the normal plane of existence you are able to move between two points in nearly the blink of an eye.

Click

  • Phases you out of the normal plane of existence
  • While phased, you are able to move at high speeds in any direction for several seconds
  • If you exit the phased state above the ground, you will slowly fall to the ground
  • Teleport has no speed penalty from combat
  • Teleport does not affect the energy cost of your powers
  • No powers can be activated while phased
  • If you enter combat within 60 seconds of leaving Teleport, you will be affected by phase sickness and will be unable to activate Teleport again for a short time

Power.Name: Ice Slide
Power.Description:
Travel
Targets Self
0-1.5 sec

Travel Power

The quintessential superhero power, flight allows you to soar through the air.

TAP

  • Grants flight
  • Slightly higher top speed than basic flight
  • Moves more slowly when moving up, but at greater speeds when moving down
  • While out of combat, flight speed gradually increases over several stages
  • While in combat, flight speed is reduced
  • Slightly less maneuverability than basic flight
  • While active, the energy cost of all powers is increased

CHARGE

  • When fully charged, Ice Slide activates at maximum flight speed

Power.Name: Swinging
Power.Description:
Travel
Targets Self
0-1.5 sec

Travel Power

The world is your playground, you are able to swing to wherever you need to go.

TAP

  • Replaces jump while you are in the air
  • Shoots a line of tensile material towards the closest stabilizing object
  • While swinging, you will move more quickly along the downswing and slow down on the upswing
  • Tapping jump while swinging will release the line and grant you a small burst of speed
  • While swinging, the energy cost of all powers is increased

Advantage.Name: Flippin'
Advantage.Description: While Swinging is active, you gain a bonus to your ability to dodge attacks.

Power.Name: Tunneling
Power.Description:
Travel
Targets Self
4 sec

Travel Power

You are one with the earth and able to move through the ground with amazing speed.

Click

  • Digs the hero into the ground
  • While underground, the hero is undetectable by enemies
  • Tunneling allows the hero to move at increased speeds
  • Other powers cannot be used while tunneling

Advantage.Name: Earthen Embrace
Advantage.Description: While Tunneling you will gain a stack of Earthern Embrace every 3 seconds, up to 6 stacks. Earthern Embrace increases your resistance to all types of damage. These stacks will persist for a short time after you stop tunneling.

Power.Name: Jet Boots
Power.Description:
Travel
Targets Self
Instant

Travel Power

The quintessential superhero power, flight allows you to soar through the air.

TAP

  • Grants flight
  • Highest top speed of all flight powers
  • While out of combat, flight speed gradually increases over several stages. This increase takes longer than other flight powers
  • While in combat, flight speed is reduced
  • Slightly less maneuverability than basic flight
  • While active, the energy cost of all powers is increased

Power.Name: Rocket Jump
Power.Description:
Travel
Targets Self
0-1.5 sec

Travel Power

Able to leap tall buildings and enormous distances in a single bound!

TAP

  • Greatly increases jump height and the speed you move while jumping
  • While out of combat, your jump height and speed will increase over several stages
  • While in combat, your jump height and speed are reduced
  • While active, the energy cost of all powers is increased

CHARGE

  • When fully charged, this power activates at maximum jump height and speed

Power.Name: Fire Flight
Power.Description:
Travel
Targets Self
0-1.5 sec

Travel Power

The quintessential superhero power, flight allows you to soar through the air.

TAP

  • Grants flight in a fiery shroud
  • Maneuverability equal to basic flight
  • While out of combat, flight speed gradually increases over several stages
  • While in combat, flight speed is reduced
  • While active, the energy cost of all powers is increased

CHARGE

  • When fully charged, you enter flight at maximum flight speed

Power.Name: Hover Disk
Power.Description:
Travel
Targets Self
0-1.5 sec

Travel Power

The quintessential superhero power, flight allows you to soar through the air.

TAP

  • Grants flight
  • Slightly higher top speed than basic flight
  • While out of combat, flight speed gradually increases over several stages
  • While in combat, flight speed is reduced
  • Slightly less manueverability than basic flight
  • While active, the energy cost of all powers is increased

CHARGE

  • When fully charged, Hover Disk activates at maximum flight speed

Power.Name: Earth Flight
Power.Description:
Travel
Targets Self
0-1.5 sec

Travel Power

The quintessential superhero power, flight allows you to soar through the air.

TAP

  • Grants flight
  • Slightly higher top speed than basic flight
  • While out of combat, flight speed gradually increases over several stages
  • While in combat, flight speed is reduced
  • Slightly less manueverability than basic flight
  • While active, the energy cost of all powers is increased

CHARGE

  • When fully charged, Earth Flight activates at maximum flight speed

Power.Name: Electric Bolt
Power.Description:
Electricity
0.35-0.55 sec

Energy Generation, Ranged Electrical Damage

Electric Bolt fires shocking arcs of electricity into your eneny.

CLICK

  • Single target electrical damage
  • Generates energy
  • Chance on the initial attack of the combo for the attack to arc to secondary target doing single target electrical damage.
  • Chance on the initial attack of applying Negative Ions, a short duration effect which causes future electrical attacks to arc to secondary targets.

Advantage.Name: Lightning Overload
Advantage.Description: Grants Electric Bolt a chance to jump to another target on every attack and not just the initial double handed attack.

Advantage.Name: Accelerated Metabolism
Advantage.Description: Every time you use this ability you have a chance to return a small amount of energy.

Power.Name: Lightning Arc
Power.Description:
Electricity
Targets foe
16 + 16 energy/0.5 sec
100 feet
.67 sec, lasts up to 5 sec

Maintained Ranged Electrical Damage

Lightning Arc is a sustained barrage of electricity which may arc to additional foes near your target.

MAINTAIN

  • Single target electrical damage
  • Damage increase every period.
  • Periodically arcs to secondary target, doing additional electrical damage.

Advantage.Name: Never Strikes Twice?
Advantage.Description: Causes Lightning Arc to deal +30% damage against held targets.

Advantage.Name: Crippling Challenge
Advantage.Description:
• Increases the threat caused by this attack, making enemies more likely to attack you.
  • Places a 20% damage debuff on the target that persists for 15 seconds. If the affected enemy attacks the taunter, it will quickly reduce this debuff's strength. Conversely, damage the taunter inflicts on the taunted enemy restores the debuff's strength.
  • This advantage Taunts an AI controlled enemy, forcing them to attack you for 4 seconds.
  • Crippling Challenge breaks through blocking and disables it for 10 seconds.

Advantage.Name: Accelerated Metabolism
Advantage.Description: Every time you use this ability you have a chance to return a small amount of energy.

Power.Name: Chain Lightning
Power.Description:
Electricity
Targets foe
15 energy
100 feet
0.67-2 sec

Charged Ranged Electrical Damage

Chain Lightning allows you to emit a powerful, directed blast of electrical energy at a target, which might arc to other nearby targets as well.

TAP

  • Single target electrical damage
  • Chance of applying Negative Ions, a short duration effect which causes future electrical attacks to arc to secondary targets.

CHARGE

  • Chains the effects of the Tap action up to three additional targets in proximity to other affected targets.
  • Charging does not increase the energy cost of Chain Lightning

Advantage.Name: Accelerated Metabolism
Advantage.Description: Every time you use this ability you have a chance to return a small amount of energy.

Advantage.Name: Lightning Helix
Advantage.Description: With this advantage, your Chain Lightning will complete Negative Ion circuits even on the first hit, and always create at least one minor chain strike.

Advantage.Name: Challenging Strikes
Advantage.Description:
• This advantage increases the threat caused by this attack against all affected targets, making them more likely to attack you.
  • If this advantage is applied to a power that has a recharge time, it will additionally add a moderate amount of threat over time to all affected targets, for the duration of the recharge.
  • This advantage inflicts a 5% damage debuff against all affected targets. If an affected enemy attacks the you, it will quickly reduce this debuff's strength. Conversely, any damage you inflicts restores the debuff's strength.

Power.Name: Gigabolt
Power.Description:
Electricity
Targets foe (5 max)
40-129 energy
100 feet; 5 foot Cylinder
0.83-3.16 sec

Ranged Cylinder Electrical Damage

Gigabolt allows you to summon 1.21 gigawatts to blast your foes.

TAP

  • Deals electrical damage to anything in line with your primary target
  • Chance of applying Negative Ions, a short duration effect which causes future electrical attacks to arc to secondary targets.
  • Chance to chain single target electrical damage

CHARGE

  • Increases damage and energy cost of the Tap effect
  • Can only be charged while affected by an Energy Form
  • Removes Energy Form effect

Advantage.Name: Accelerated Metabolism
Advantage.Description: Every time you use this ability you have a chance to return a small amount of energy.

Advantage.Name: Death Arc
Advantage.Description: Any enemies killed by Gigabolt will unleash area effect damage to nearby targets.

Power.Name: Energy Storm
Power.Description:
Energy Projector
20-69 + 9.9 energy/0.5sec 0.5-1 sec, lasts up to 1.5 sec

Cone debuff and powerful single target attack.

Absorb power from your enemies and send it back at them with cataclysmic fury.

Consume Energy
MAINTAIN

  • All enemies in a forward arc are slowed.
  • For each enemy slowed, you will gain a stack of the Infused Energy buff, which increases all damage you deal for a short duration.
  • While you are affected by Infused Energy, this power becomes Unleashed Tempest.
  • If an affected enemy is under the effect of Clinging Flames, Negative Ions, or Chill, that effect will be consumed, and grant you an appropriate type of Energy Charge.
  • If an affected enemy is protected by a force field type effect, such as Containment Field, that effect will be significantly degraded, and you will be granted Energy Charge - Force.
  • This power has a 30 second cooldown that begins when the Infused Energy buffs expire.

Unleashed Tempest
CLICK

  • Extremely powerful single target Particle attack.
  • If enhanced by Energy Charge - Fire, this attack will detonate in an area of effect on contact with the target.
  • If enhanced by Energy Charge - Ice, this attack gains a significant bonus to critical severity.
  • If enhanced by Energy Charge - Electricity, this attack will chain to a second target.
  • If enhanced by Energy Charge - Force, this attack will significantly reduce the target's damage for a short duration.
  • In addition, each type of Energy Charge increases the damage done by your Unleashed Tempest, and reduces its energy cost.
  • Activating Unleashed Tempest consumes all instances of the Infused Energy buff and triggers the cooldown on Consume Energy.

Advantage.Name: Weather the Storm
Advantage.Description: Secondary energy effects, such as clinging flames, have a chance to not be consumed when you use Energy Storm.

Power.Name: Sparkstorm
Power.Description:
Electricity
14 + 10 energy/0.5sec
0.5 sec, lasts up to 4 sec

Maintained Close Area Effect Electrical Damage

Sparkstorm is a shower of electrical energy which damages foes close to you. Show them that they do not want to get too close to your electric personality.

MAINTAIN

  • Deals electrical damage to nearby enemies
  • This power may be used while Held
  • Chance for attack to arc to secondary target doing single target electrical damage.
  • Chance of applying Negative Ions, a short duration effect which causes future electrical attacks to arc to secondary targets.
  • If a target with Negative ions is hit, the target is knocked back and Negative Ions is removed.

Advantage.Name: Electric Personality
Advantage.Description: Changes Sparkstorm to a toggle. The toggle has a max duration equal to the maintain limit of Spark Storm and retains the same energy costs.

Advantage.Name: Accelerated Metabolism
Advantage.Description: Every time you use this ability you have a chance to return a small amount of energy.

Advantage.Name: Challenging Strikes
Advantage.Description:
• This advantage increases the threat caused by this attack against all affected targets, making them more likely to attack you.
  • If this advantage is applied to a power that has a recharge time, it will additionally add a moderate amount of threat over time to all affected targets, for the duration of the recharge.
  • This advantage inflicts a 5% damage debuff against all affected targets. If an affected enemy attacks the you, it will quickly reduce this debuff's strength. Conversely, any damage you inflicts restores the debuff's strength.

Power.Name: Thunderstrike
Power.Description:
Electricity
Targets Foe (5 max)
38-85 energy
100 feet; 10 foot Sphere
.67-2 sec

Charged Ranged Area Electrical Damage

Thunderstrike calls upon the forces of nature to deliver a powerful bolt of lightning onto your enemies.

TAP

  • Single target electrical damage
  • Deals half damage to other targets around the primary target
  • Completes Negative Ion circuits on all affected targets, returning a small amount of energy if you have the Ionic Reverberation power.

CHARGE

  • Increases the damage and energy cost of the Tapeffect

Advantage.Name: Ionic Compression
Advantage.Description: Causes Thunderstrike to root the targets hit in addition to its normal damage.

Power.Name: Electrocute
Power.Description:
Electricity
Targets foe
47 energy
50 feet
0.67-1.17-2.67 sec

Ranged Immobilization

Electrocute temporarily immobilizes a target with a massive jolt to their nervous system.

CHARGE

  • Must be charged at least .25 seconds
  • Applies a hold to target with strength based on charge time
  • Applies Negative Ions a short duration effect which causes future Electrical attacks to arc secondary targets.
  • If charged over 50%, chains Arc to a nearby enemy dealing electrical damage
  • If fully charged, chains Arc to nearby enemies dealing electrical damage

Advantage.Name: Superconductor
Advantage.Description: Places a stacking debuff on the target of Electrocute which increases all electrical damage dealt to the target by a scaling value for 20 seconds.

Advantage.Name: Accelerated Metabolism
Advantage.Description: Every time you use this ability you have a chance to return a small amount of energy.

Power.Name: Ball Lightning
Power.Description:
Electricity
Targets foe
88 energy
100 feet
0.83 sec

Uncontrolled Electrical Combat Pet

Ball Lightning summons a sphere of electrical energy to fight your foe. The sphere will chase them down, and deal damage to other nearby enemies as well.

CLICK

  • Summons one Ball Lightning to attack your target
  • Ball Lightning deals electrical damage to nearby targets.
  • Ball Lightning has a small chance to chain single target electrical damage to nearby enemies.
  • After 12 sec, Ball Lightning detonates, dealing electrical damage to nearby targets, each of those hits has a 50% chance to chain single target electrical damage to an additional target.

Advantage.Name: Triplicity
Advantage.Description: Ball Lightning now summons 3 Ball Lightnings instead of one. All three deal AE damage, but only one will explode.

Power.Name: Electric Sheath
Power.Description:
Electricity
Targets self
Instant

Electric Self Buff, Energy Form

Electrical Sheath coats you in a tight field of Electricity, improving your combat abilities for a short period of time.

CLICK

  • Increases damage of non-energy-generating attacks
  • Gain energy when dealt damage
  • Can be used while held or confused
  • Assists in breaking out of holds
  • Increases energy equilibrium
  • Reduces rate of energy decay
  • Counts as an Energy Form

Advantage.Name: Matter - Energy Union
Advantage.Description: This Advantage super charges your energy Sheath, briefly erasing the distinction between your tangible body and the energy it contains. For up to the duration of your Sheath power, incoming damage will be subtracted from your energy instead of your health. The benefit provided by this advantage can only reroute a limited amount of damage, after which damage will be dealt to you as normal.

Power.Name: Ionic Reverberation
Power.Description:
Electricity
Instant

Innate Passive, Secondary Energy Unlock

Ionic Reverberation causes a small amount of energy to return to you each time one of your electrical attacks arcs to another enemy.

INNATE PASSIVE

  • Does not need to be slotted in order to function
  • Generates energy each time one of your electrical attacks arcs to a target affected by the Negative Ions debuff.

Power.Name: Electric Form
Power.Description:
Electricity
Instant

Slotted Passive, Damage Buff, Damage Resistance Buff, Energy Form

Your mastery of electricity grants you the knowledge of how to most effectively use your energy powers and how to reduce the effect of your attacker's energy attacks.

SLOTTED PASSIVE

  • Can be slotted in an Offensive or Balanced passive power slot
  • Only active while in combat
  • Increases all of your energy (electricity, sonic, particle) damage. This increase scales with your Endurance.
  • Increases your resistance to all energy effects and greatly increases your resistance to electricity effects. These resistances scale with your Recovery.
  • Generates a small amount of energy when you are struck with electrical attacks
  • Increases your energy equilibrium and the rate your energy builds to your equilibrium
  • Counts as an Energy Form

Power.Name: Electric Shield
Power.Description:
Electricity
Affects foe
Instant
7 foot Sphere

Block Slot Enhancement

Electrical Shield creates a protective barrier of crackling electricity that significantly reduces incoming damage and causes enemies around you to receive a nasty shock.

MAINTAIN

  • Self damage reduction with less Physical damage reduction than other Block powers.
  • Deals light electrical damage to enemies in melee range

Advantage.Name: Electric Vengance
Advantage.Description: If your energy is high, your Electric Shield will automatically retaliate against any aggressors that are within 50 feet. Each retalitory strike consumes an escalating amount of energy.

Power.Name: Throw Fire
Power.Description:
Fire
0.3-0.47 sec

Energy Generation, Ranged Fire Damage

Throw Fire throws small bolrs of flame at your target.

CLICK

  • Single fire damage
  • Generates energy
  • First shot has a chance to apply Clinging Flames , dealing damage over time to the target. Other powers may also take advantage of Clinging Flames.

Advantage.Name: Burning Desire
Advantage.Description: Gives your Throw Fire power a chance to chain into an additional target. This second shot does not generate energy, but has a chance to light the target aflame.

Advantage.Name: Accelerated Metabolism
Advantage.Description: Every time you use this ability you have a chance to return a small amount of energy.

Power.Name: Heat Wave
Power.Description:
Fire
Targets foe
29 + 22 energy/sec
50 feet
0.67 sec, lasts up to 7 sec

Maintained Ranged Fire Damage

Heat Wave directs a blast of searing air on your target, causing damage and incapacitating the target after a short time.

MAINTAIN

  • Single target fire damage
  • Holds the target
  • Chance to apply Clinging Flames dealing damage over time to the target. Other powers may also take advantage of the ClingingFlames.

Advantage.Name: Engulfing Flames
Advantage.Description: Damage starts out smaller than normal, but grows much higher.

Power.Name: Fire Strike
Power.Description:
Fire
Targets foe
7.5 energy
100 feet
0.5 sec

Ranged Fire Damage

Fire Strike throws a small but volatile ball of fire at your target.

CLICK

  • Single target fire damage
  • Activating this power applies an instance of the Fiery Escalation buff to you, increasing the damage of your Fire Strike attacks by a small amount while it lasts. This buff has a very short duration, but stacks up to four times, and each application refreshes the stack.
  • Chance to apply Clinging Flames, dealing damage over time to the target. Other powers may also take advantage of the Clinging Flames.

Advantage.Name: Crippling Challenge
Advantage.Description:
• Increases the threat caused by this attack, making enemies more likely to attack you.
  • Places a 20% damage debuff on the target that persists for 15 seconds. If the affected enemy attacks the taunter, it will quickly reduce this debuff's strength. Conversely, damage the taunter inflicts on the taunted enemy restores the debuff's strength.
  • This advantage Taunts an AI controlled enemy, forcing them to attack you for 4 seconds. All taunts share a 10 second cooldown, and an enemy that has been taunted by any source cannot be taunted again for 10 seconds.

Advantage.Name: Accelerated Metabolism
Advantage.Description: Every time you use this ability you have a chance to return a small amount of energy.

Advantage.Name: Wildfire
Advantage.Description: If your target is affected by the Clinging Flames condition, your Fire Strike attack will refresh the Clinging Flames effect, and will cause a small amount of fire damage to all targets in a small area effect.

Power.Name: Energy Storm
Power.Description:
Energy Projector
20-69 + 9.9 energy/0.5sec 0.5-1 sec, lasts up to 1.5 sec

Cone debuff and powerful single target attack.

Absorb power from your enemies and send it back at them with cataclysmic fury.

Consume Energy
MAINTAIN

  • All enemies in a forward arc are slowed.
  • For each enemy slowed, you will gain a stack of the Infused Energy buff, which increases all damage you deal for a short duration.
  • While you are affected by Infused Energy, this power becomes Unleashed Tempest.
  • If an affected enemy is under the effect of Clinging Flames, Negative Ions, or Chill, that effect will be consumed, and grant you an appropriate type of Energy Charge.
  • If an affected enemy is protected by a force field type effect, such as Containment Field, that effect will be significantly degraded, and you will be granted Energy Charge - Force.
  • This power has a 30 second cooldown that begins when the Infused Energy buffs expire.

Unleashed Tempest
CLICK

  • Extremely powerful single target Particle attack.
  • If enhanced by Energy Charge - Fire, this attack will detonate in an area of effect on contact with the target.
  • If enhanced by Energy Charge - Ice, this attack gains a significant bonus to critical severity.
  • If enhanced by Energy Charge - Electricity, this attack will chain to a second target.
  • If enhanced by Energy Charge - Force, this attack will significantly reduce the target's damage for a short duration.
  • In addition, each type of Energy Charge increases the damage done by your Unleashed Tempest, and reduces its energy cost.
  • Activating Unleashed Tempest consumes all instances of the Infused Energy buff and triggers the cooldown on Consume Energy.

Advantage.Name: Weather the Storm
Advantage.Description: Secondary energy effects, such as clinging flames, have a chance to not be consumed when you use Energy Storm.

Power.Name: Fire Breath
Power.Description:
Fire
Targets foe (5 max)
25 + 16 energy /0.5 sec
50 feet; 45 degree Cone
0.67 sec, lasts up to 5 sec

MAINTAIN

  • Damage increase per period.
  • Chance to apply Clinging Flames, dealing damage over time to the target. Other powers may also take advantage of the Clinging Flames.

Advantage.Name: Challenging Strikes

• This advantage increases the threat caused by this attack against all affected targets, making them more likely to attack you.
  • If this advantage is applied to a power that has a recharge time, it will additionally add a moderate amount of threat over time to all affected targets, for the duration of the recharge.
  • This advantage inflicts a 5% damage debuff against all affected targets. If an affected enemy attacks the you, it will quickly reduce this debuff's strength. Conversely, any damage you inflicts restores the debuff's strength.

Instant

Fire
Affects foe (5 max)
Instant
7 foot Sphere

Slotted Passive, Damage Buff, Damage Resistance Buff, Energy Form

Your mastery of fire grants you the knowledge of how to most effectively use your elemental powers and how to reduce the effect of your attacker's elemental attacks.

SLOTTED PASSIVE

  • Can be slotted in an Offensive or Balanced passive power slot
  • Only active while in combat
  • Increases all of your elemental (fire, ice, toxic) damage. This increase scales with your Presence.

  • Generates a small amount of energy when you are struck with fire attacks
  • Periodically deals fire damage to enemies withing 7 feet of you
  • Counts as an Energy Form

Force
Instant

SLOTTED PASSIVE

Power.Name: Form of the Unleashed Tempest
Power.Description:
Dual Blades
Targets self
20 energy
1-3.5 sec

Form

With a few moments of concentration and preparation, you may adopt an advanced martial posture. This power causes your damage to increase when you embrace the strengths of your chosen martial arts style, and when Advantaged can provide other unique benefits.

TOGGLE

  • While you maintain this Form, you will gain an instance of Focus whenever you score a Critical Hit.
  • The Focus buff increases your melee damage and grants you a small amount of energy. This energy gain scales with your Dexterity and you may gain energy in this way at most once every 4 seconds. The damage buff scales with your Strength and Dexterity and you gain up to eight stacks of this buff.
  • At Rank Two you have a 20% chance to gain an additional stack of Focus whenever you score a Critical Hit. At Rank Three you have a 40% chance to gain an additional stack of Focus whenever you score a Critical Hit.
  • While not in combat, this power will grant and maintain stacks of Focus up to the rank of the power.
  • You must fully charge this power to activate it, and taking any damage will interrupt your concentration, canceling the charge.
  • While this power is active, the energy cost of all of your other powers is slightly increased.
  • While this power is active, you are too focused to become angry, and stacks of Enraged fall off of you if you ever have more than one stack.
  • You may only have ONE Form type power active at a time! Activating another immediately ends any pre existing Forms.

Advantage.Name: Form of the Unleashed Tempest Rank 2
Form of the Unleashed Tempest Rank 3
Advantage.RequiredAdvantage: Form of the Unleashed Tempest Rank 2

Advantage.Name: Gifts of the Storm
Advantage.Description:
It is the essential nature of a Master of the Untamed Tempest style to project everything they are and have outwards. Against their enemies, practitioners of this style give gifts of their skill and steel, bringing death and justice. With this technique, the enlightened Tempest learns how to harness their Chi to extend this principle, sharing any healing you receive with your allies.

  • This power grants 20% of any healing you receive to allies within 20 feet while Form of the Unleashed Tempest is active.
  • This effect can occur at most once per eight seconds.

Power.Description:
Martial Arts
Instant

Slotted Passive, Self Dodge and Avoidance Buff

You have honed your reflexes to perfection and are able to move with impossible speed to avoid attacks.

SLOTTED PASSIVE

  • Increases dodge and avoidance. This effect scales with your Dexterity.
  • Your chance to dodge an attack increases by a small amount for every attack against you until you successfully dodge an attack.
  • Automatically reduces the damage of all Bleed and Damage over Time effects by the Avoidance amount.

Martial Arts

CLICK

  • 15 second duration
  • 90 second Cooldown

Power.Name: Way of the Enlightened Warrior
Power.Description:
Martial Arts
Instant

Melee Damage, dodge and avoidance buff.

You have the stance, form, and discipline of a trained Master of the Martial Arts. You strike harder and more accurately, and your deft stance allows you to avoid more damage more often. Additionally, a Master of the Martial Arts never wastes energy on a strike that will not connect; attacks that your enemy dodges refund a portion of their cost.

SLOTTED PASSIVE

  • Can be slotted in an Offensive or Balanced passive power slot
  • Increases all of your physical melee damage (slashing, piercing, crushing). This increase scales with your Strength and Dexterity.
  • Increases your dodge and avoidance ratings. This effect scales with your Dexterity.
  • Generates a small amount of energy when your opponent dodges your attacks.

  • Places a 20% damage debuff on the target that persists for 15 seconds. If the affected enemy attacks the taunter, it will quickly reduce this debuff's strength. Conversely, damage the taunter inflicts on the taunted enemy restores the debuff's strength.
  • This advantage Taunts an AI controlled enemy, forcing them to attack you for 4 seconds. All taunts share a 10 second cooldown, and an enemy that has been taunted by any source cannot be taunted again for 10 seconds.
  • Crippling Challenge breaks through blocking and disables it for 10 seconds.

Power.Name: Thunderbolt Lunge
Power.Description:
Martial Arts
7.1-19 energy
0.67 sec

Lunge Crushing Damage, Reverse Lunge

Thunderbolt Lunge is a versatile ability allowing you to either close distance with your target or increase the distance as needed.

CLICK

  • While moving, lunges towards the target
  • While moving, deals crushing damage to the target
  • While moving, removes all travel powers from target
  • While stationary, lunge away from target
  • At Rank 2, when you attempt to lunge away from an enemy, you have a chance to automatically escape most types of snares and roots.
  • At Rank 3, when you attempt to lunge away from an enemy, you will briefly gain a significant amount of Stealth. This Stealth bonus ends if you take or deal any damage.

Advantage.Name: Essence Assault
Advantage.Description: Removes travel powers from targets hit by Thunderbolt Lunge

Martial Arts
Affects foe (10 max)
28 + 22 energy/0.5 sec
25 feet; 60 degree Cone
0.5 sec, lasts up to 4 sec

MAINTAINED

  • Deals slashing and fire damage to nearby targets
  • If you affected by Heightened Focus, this attack also snares your foes.
  • Each stack of Heightened Focus increases the damage of this attack by 20%, above and beyond the normal bonus damage they grant.
  • When this power ends, it consumes all instances of Heightened Focus

Advantage.Name: Real Ultimate Power
Advantage.Description: The purpose of this advantage is to flip out and make people bleed. Your Fury of the Dragon has multiple chances to cause a bleed effect on the target.

12 energy
7 feet
0.67 sec

Martial Arts

5 energy
0.67 sec

  • Reduces damage dealt

Power.Name: Form of the Unconquered Swordsman
Power.Description:
Single Blade
Targets self
20 energy
1-3.5 sec

Form

With a few moments of concentration and preparation, you may adopt an advanced martial posture. This power causes your damage to increase when you embrace the strengths of your chosen martial arts style, and when Advantaged can provide other unique benefits.

TOGGLE

  • While you maintain this Form, you will gain an instance of Focus whenever you apply or rupture a bleed.
  • The Focus buff increases your melee damage and grants you a small amount of energy. This energy gain scales with your Dexterity and you may gain energy in this way at most once every 4 seconds. The damage buff scales with your Strength and Dexterity and you gain up to eight stacks of this buff.
  • At Rank Two you have a 20% chance to gain an additional stack of Focus whenever you apply or rupture a bleed. At Rank Three you have a 40% chance to gain an additional stack of Focus whenever you apply or rupture a bleed.
  • While not in combat, this power will grant and maintain stacks of Focus up to the rank of the power.

Advantage.Name: Form of the Unconquered Swordsman Rank 2
Form of the Unconquered Swordsman Rank 3
Advantage.RequiredAdvantage: Form of the Unconquered Swordsman Rank 2

Advantage.Name: Cut Where It Counts
Advantage.Description:
The cuts of a master of the Unconquered Swordsman strike the most vital areas of their targets, resulting in wounds that are frighteningly difficult to heal.

  • Attacks against bleeding enemies inflict the Cut Where It Counts debuff, reducing the potency of all healing effects on the target.

Power.Name: Lightning Reflexes
Power.Description:
Martial Arts
Instant

Slotted Passive, Self Dodge and Avoidance Buff

You have honed your reflexes to perfection and are able to move with impossible speed to avoid attacks.

SLOTTED PASSIVE

  • Can be slotted in a Defensive or Balanced passive power slot
  • Increases dodge and avoidance. This effect scales with your Dexterity.
  • Your chance to dodge an attack increases by a small amount for every attack against you until you successfully dodge an attack.
  • Automatically reduces the damage of all Bleed and Damage over Time effects by the Avoidance amount.

Power.Name: Sneak
Power.Description:
Martial Arts
Targets self
0-0.5 sec

Stealth

When you need to go unnotices, sneaking can get you to otherwise inaccessible spots.

CLICK

  • Places you in stealth, reducing the chance for enemies to see you.
  • Entering combat will remove you from stealth
  • While stealthed you will move at half speed
  • Stealth has reduced effectiveness against other players.

Advantage.Name: Silent Running
Advantage.Description: Increases your movement speed while sneaking.

Power.Name: Masterful Dodge
Power.Description:
Martial Arts
Targets self
Instant

Self Dodge and Avoidance Buff

In moments of need you are able focus your attention on avoiding the attacks of your foes.

CLICK

  • Greatly increases your dodge and avoidance for a short time
  • Can be used while Held
  • 15 second duration
  • 90 second Cooldown
  • This power is considered to be an Active Defense Activating this power imposes a 30 second cooldown on all other Active Defenses

Advantage.Name: Unfettered Strikes
Advantage.Description: Each time you dodge an attack while Masterful Dodge is active, you gain an Opportunity Strike buff, increasing your damage for a short time.

Power.Name: Way of the Enlightened Warrior
Power.Description:
Martial Arts
Instant

Melee Damage, dodge and avoidance buff.

You have the stance, form, and discipline of a trained Master of the Martial Arts. You strike harder and more accurately, and your deft stance allows you to avoid more damage more often. Additionally, a Master of the Martial Arts never wastes energy on a strike that will not connect; attacks that your enemy dodges refund a portion of their cost.

SLOTTED PASSIVE

  • Can be slotted in an Offensive or Balanced passive power slot
  • Increases all of your physical melee damage (slashing, piercing, crushing). This increase scales with your Strength and Dexterity.
  • Increases your dodge and avoidance ratings. This effect scales with your Dexterity.
  • Generates a small amount of energy when your opponent dodges your attacks.

Advantage.Name: Way of the Enlightened Warrior Rank 2
Way of the Enlightened Warrior Rank 3
Advantage.RequiredAdvantage: Way of the Enlightened Warrior Rank 2

Targets self
Instant

Parry is an enhanced Block power that allows you to, with careful timing, return some damage to an attacker.

MAINTAIN

  • Self damage reduction
  • For 2 seconds after you begin blocking, you will return a portion of one incoming attack to the attacker. After activating Parry (if you deflect an attack or not) you cannot activate Parry again for 6 seconds (you may continue to Block as normal).

Advantage.Description: Every time you use this ability you have a chance to return a small amount of energy

Advantage.Name: Warlock's Malice
Advantage.Description: Gives each pulse of Skarn's Bane a chance to root the target.

Advantage.Name: Challenging Strikes
Advantage.Description:
• This advantage increases the threat caused by this attack against all affected targets, making them more likely to attack you.
  • If this advantage is applied to a power that has a recharge time, it will additionally add a moderate amount of threat over time to all affected targets, for the duration of the recharge.
  • This advantage inflicts a 5% damage debuff against all affected targets. If an affected enemy attacks the you, it will quickly reduce this debuff's strength. Conversely, any damage you inflicts restores the debuff's strength.

Power.Name: Planar Fracture
Power.Description:
Mystic
Targets foe
101 energy
50 feet
0.5-2.5 sec

Charged Area Dimensional Damage

Planar Fracture creates a tear in time and space, linking this plane with another. Chaotic energy pours forth from the fracture, causing random damage and status effects on your foes.

CHARGE

  • Creates a Planar Fracture near your target
  • Planar Fracture deals dimensional damage to targets close to it
  • The chaotic energies flowing from the Planar Fracture creates random status effects on nearby enemies
  • Must be fully charged

Advantage.Name: Double Vortex
Advantage.Description: Your Planar Fracture now causes 2 random debuffs on each target instead of 1.

Power.Name: Binding of Aratron
Power.Description:
Sorcery
Targets foe
18 + 6.7 energy/sec
50 feet
0.67 sec, lasts up to 3 sec

Maintained Ranged Hold

Binding of Aratron channels eldritch energy to lock your enemy to the ground.

MAINTAIN

  • Holds target
  • Strength of hold increases each second maintained, allowing you to hold stronger targets or preventing the target from breaking free

Advantage.Name: Tenable Bonds
Advantage.Description: While Binding of Aratron is maintained on your target it will drain the target's energy and return health to you.

Power.Name: Urthona's Charm
Power.Description:
Sorcery
Targets foe
48 energy
100 feet
0.67-2.17 sec

Charged Ranged Confuse

Urthona's Charm attacks the mind of your target, causing them to become temporarily confused.

TAP

  • Confuses target for a short time

CHARGE

  • Increases duration of the Tap effect

h

Advantage.Name: Ephemeral Endowment
Advantage.Description: Increases the damage, defense and speed of the target of Urthona's Charm for a short duration

Power.Name: Ritual of Arcane Summoning
Power.Description:
Arcane Sorcery
Targets self
48 energy
0.67-2.17 sec

Ritual, Uncontrolled Pet

Ritaul of Arcane Summoning summons an Arcane Construct to help destroy your enemies.

CLICK

  • Summons a Ritual circle at your feet. The Ritual summons a Mystic Construct to fight for you.
  • The Mystic Construct has the Electric Bolts power
  • At higher ranks the Mystic Construct gains the Chain Lightning and Electrocute powers
  • Leaving the Ritual's circle for more than a few seconds will cause the Ritual Circle to disappear
  • Only one Ritual can be active at a time
  • Cost of the Ritual is based on your Equilibrium

Advantage.Name: Meek Inheritance
Advantage.Description: Entities summoned by this Summoning Ritual are controllable

Power.Name: Tyrannon's Familiar
Power.Description:
Sorcery
24 energy
0.5-0.67-3.5-3.67 sec

Controllable Combat Pet

Familiar summons a loyal golem familiar to your service.

CHARGE

  • Energy cost for summoning is equal to half your equilibrium
  • Summons a controllable Golem Familiar
  • The Golem Familiar will periodically become Charged. This can occur multiple times and will stack

MAINTAIN

  • Works while your Golem Familiar is summoned
  • Siphons charges from your Golem Familiar, returning energy to you for each charge siphoned
  • Each charged siphoned temporarily increases the damage you deal

Power.Name: Arcane Vitality
Power.Description:
Arcane Sorcery
13 + 10 energy/0.5 sec
0.67 sec, lasts up to 4 sec

Cone Healing

Arcane Vitality creates a focused surge of mystical healing energy that affects you or multiple allies.

MAINTAIN

  • While targeting a friend, creates a cone area of effect heal, which can heal friendly targets. The amount of healing done is reduced if you have more than 2 targets
  • If no friendly is targeted, heals yourself

Advantage.Name: Impart Freedom
Advantage.Description: Your Arcane Vitality will now remove all control effects at the end of a full maintain.

Power.Name: Circle of Arcane Power
Power.Description:
Arcane Sorcery
Targets selc
48 energy
0.67-2.17 sec

Circle, Self Energy Buff

Circle of Arcane Power creates a circle of energy around you. While inside the circle you are able to recover your powers with amazing speed.

CLICK

  • Summons a Circle at your feet. The Circle grants energy every 2 seconds, reduces your rate of energy decay and counts as an Energy Form
  • Leaving the Circle for more than a few seconds will cause the Circle to disappear
  • Only one Circle can be active at a time

Power.Name: Aura of Arcane Clarity
Power.Description:
Arcane Sorcery
Affects teammate
Instant
50 foot Sphere

Aura, Close Area Effect Energy Discount Buff

Aura of Clarity reduces combat fatigue in your allies, allowing them to recover faster and fight harder.

SLOTTED PASSIVE

  • Can be slotted in a Support or Balanced passive power slot
  • Increases energy recovery rate of nearby allies. This increase if larger for you than your allies
  • Reduces energy cose of power for nearby allies. This increase is larger for you than your allies

Power.Name: Eldritch Shield
Power.Description:
Sorcery
Targets self
Instant

Block Slot Enhancement

Eldritch Shield creates a protective barrier of focused magical energy.

MAINTAIN

  • Self damage reduction with better Non-Physical damage reduction than other Block powers

Advantage.Name: Imbue with Power
Advantage.Description:
Adds a different effect to your shield based on which Aura you have active:
  • Aura of Arcane Clarity: Your shield now returns more energy during a block.
  • Aura of Primal Majesty: Your shield now has a chance to strike your attacker with a bolt of lightning.
  • Aura of Ebon Destruction: Your shield now has a chance to Fear your attackers.
  • Aura of Radiant Protection: Your shield now has a chance to place a Heal over Time on you.

Power.Name: Eldritch Bolts
Power.Description:
Sorcery
0.34-0.5 sec

Energy Generation, Ranged Magic Damage

Eldritch Bolts fires balls of eldritch energy to blast your enemy.

CLICK

  • Single target magic damage
  • Generates energy
  • Initial attack has a chance to root the target

Advantage.Name: Wizard's Discretion
Advantage.Description: Eldritch Bolts have a chance to apply Binding of Aratron, holding your target

Advantage.Name: Accelerated Metabolism
Advantage.Description: Every time you use this ability you have a chance to return a small amount of energy.

Power.Name: Eldritch Blast
Power.Description:
Sorcery
Targets foe
5.7-66 energy
100 feet
0.5-3 sec

Ranged Magic Damage

Eldritch Blast fires a concentrated blast of eldritch energy at your enemy.

TAP

  • Single target magic damage
  • Chance to root your target

CHARGE

  • Increases damage and energy cost of the Tap effect
  • Chance to root increases with charge

Advantage.Name: Crippling Challenge
Advantage.Description:
• Increases the threat caused by this attack, making enemies more likely to attack you.
  • Places a 20% damage debuff on the target that persists for 15 seconds. If the affected enemy attacks the taunter, it will quickly reduce this debuff's strength. Conversely, damage the taunter inflicts on the taunted enemy restores the debuff's strength.
  • This advantage Taunts an AI controlled enemy, forcing them to attack you for 4 seconds. All taunts share a 10 second cooldown, and an enemy that has been taunted by any source cannot be taunted again for 10 seconds.
  • Crippling Challenge breaks through blocking and disables it for 10 seconds.

Advantage.Name: Accelerated Metabolism
Advantage.Description: Every time you use this ability you have a chance to return a small amount of energy.

Advantage.Name: Sorcerer's Whim
Advantage.Description: Eldritch Blast deals extra damage to held targets

Power.Name: Invocation of Storm Calling
Power.Description:
Primal Sorcery
Affects foe (5 max)
15 + 15 energy/sec
25 foot Sphere
0.83 sec, lasts up to 4 sec

Maintained Close Area Effect Repel

Invocation of Storm Calling calls upon nature's fury to drive your enemies away from you.

MAINTAIN

  • Repels targets
  • Affected targets have their movement speed reduced
  • Affected targets have their energy damage resistance debuffed
  • If fully maintained, deals electrical damage to target and all other nearby targets

Advantage.Name: Electrical Storm
Advantage.Description: Your Storm now deals periodic damage while it is maintained.

Power.Name: Sigils of the Primal Storm
Power.Description:
Primal Sorcery
22-45 energy
0.67-1.5-2 sec

Sigils of the Primal Storm summons 5 sigils around you to deliver deadly electrical shocks to any enemy who comes too close.

CHARGE

  • Each sigil deals electrical damage to targets within 15 feet of the sigil every 2 seconds
  • Chance for Electrical attacks to chain to another target
  • Must be fully charged

Advantage.Description: Gives each pulse of Skarn's Bane a chance to root the target.

Advantage.Name: Challenging Strikes
Advantage.Description:
• This advantage increases the threat caused by this attack against all affected targets, making them more likely to attack you.
  • If this advantage is applied to a power that has a recharge time, it will additionally add a moderate amount of threat over time to all affected targets, for the duration of the recharge.
  • This advantage inflicts a 5% damage debuff against all affected targets. If an affected enemy attacks the you, it will quickly reduce this debuff's strength. Conversely, any damage you inflicts restores the debuff's strength.

Power.Name: Planar Fracture
Power.Description:
Mystic
Targets foe
101 energy
50 feet
0.5-2.5 sec

Charged Area Dimensional Damage

Planar Fracture creates a tear in time and space, linking this plane with another. Chaotic energy pours forth from the fracture, causing random damage and status effects on your foes.

CHARGE

  • Creates a Planar Fracture near your target
  • Planar Fracture deals dimensional damage to targets close to it
  • The chaotic energies flowing from the Planar Fracture creates random status effects on nearby enemies
  • Must be fully charged

Advantage.Name: Double Vortex
Advantage.Description: Your Planar Fracture now causes 2 random debuffs on each target instead of 1.

Power.Name: Binding of Aratron
Power.Description:
Sorcery
Targets foe
18 + 6.7 energy/sec
50 feet
0.67 sec, lasts up to 3 sec

Maintained Ranged Hold

Binding of Aratron channels eldritch energy to lock your enemy to the ground.

MAINTAIN

  • Holds target
  • Strength of hold increases each second maintained, allowing you to hold stronger targets or preventing the target from breaking free

Advantage.Name: Tenable Bonds
Advantage.Description: While Binding of Aratron is maintained on your target it will drain the target's energy and return health to you.

Power.Name: Urthona's Charm
Power.Description:
Sorcery
Targets foe
48 energy
100 feet
0.67-2.17 sec

Charged Ranged Confuse

Urthona's Charm attacks the mind of your target, causing them to become temporarily confused.

TAP

  • Confuses target for a short time

CHARGE

  • Increases duration of the Tap effect

Advantage.Name: Ephemeral Endowment
Advantage.Description: Increases the damage, defense and speed of the target of Urthona's Charm for a short duration

Power.Name: Ritual of Radiant Summoning
Power.Description:
Radiant Sorcery
Targets self
48 energy
0.67-2.17 sec

Ritual, Uncontrolled Pet

Ritual of Radiant Summoning calls upon the ethereal plane and summons a Spirit to assist you.

CLICK

  • Summons a Ritual circle at your feet. The Ritual summons a Spirit to fight for you.
  • The summoned Spirit has flying and a ranged crushing attack which can debuff the target's damage
  • At higher ranks, the Spirit will gain the Condemn power and a targeted heal
  • Leaving the Ritual's circle for more than a few seconds will cause the Ritual circle to disappear
  • Only one Ritual can be active at a time
  • Cost of the Ritual is based on your Equilibrium

Advantage.Name: Meek Inheritance
Advantage.Description: Entities summoned by this Summoning Ritual are controllable

Power.Name: Tyrannon's Familiar
Power.Description:
Sorcery
24 energy
0.5-0.67-3.5-3.67 sec

Controllable Combat Pet

Familiar summons a loyal golem familiar to your service.

CHARGE

  • Energy cost for summoning is equal to half your equilibrium
  • Summons a controllable Golem Familiar
  • The Golem Familiar will periodically become Charged. This can occur multiple times and will stack

MAINTAIN

  • Works while your Golem Familiar is summoned
  • Siphons charges from your Golem Familiar, returning energy to you for each charge siphoned
  • Each charged siphoned temporarily increases the damage you deal

Power.Name: Divine Renewal
Power.Description:
Radiant Sorcery
20 energy
0.83 sec, lasts up to 9 sec sec

Ally Resurrect

Divine Renewal uses eldritch energy to revive your defeated friends.

MAINTAIN

  • Must be fully maintained.
  • Resurrects an ally directly in front of you, bringing them back to life with 30% health.
  • Taking damage will interrupt maintaining this power

Advantage.Name: Radiant Renewal
Advantage.Description: Radiant Renewal resurrects up to 4 friends withing 25 feet.

Power.Name: Aura of Radiant Protection
Power.Description:
Radiant Sorcery
Affects teammate
Instant
50 foot Sphere

Aura, Close Area Effect Damage Resist Buff

Aura of Radiant Protection uses your mere presence to bolster your allies' defenses.

SLOTTED PASSIVE

  • Can be slotted in a Support or Balanced passive power slot slot
  • Increases damage resistance of you and nearby allies. This increase is larger for you than your allies

Power.Name: Circle of Radiant Glory
Power.Description:
Radiant Sorcery
Targets self
48 energy
0.67-2.17 sec

Circle, Self Revive

Circle of Radiant Glory creates a circle of benevolent power. Should you be defeated while inside the circle it will return you to the fight. Ranking up this power will increase the amount of health you return with.

CLICK

  • Summons a Circle at your feet. If you are defeated while inside the Circle, you will be revived.
  • If you are revived by the Circle, the Circle will be destroyed and cannot be summoned again for 2 minutes.
  • Leaving the Circle for more than a few seconds will cause the Circle to disappear
  • Only one Circle can be active at a time

Power.Name: Sigils of Radiant Sanctuary
Power.Description:
Radiant Sorcery
34-69 energy
0.67-1.5-2 sec

Sigils, Charged Area Stealth Buff

Sigils of Radiant Sanctuary summons 5 sigil stones that effectively hide you and your allies within their circle.

CHARGE

  • Buffs stealth of your allies
  • Must be fully charged
  • Only one type of sigil can be active at a time
  • Sigils can be attacked and destroyed

Advantage.Name: Accelerated Metabolism
Advantage.Description: Every time you use this ability you have a chance to return a small amount of energy.

Advantage.Name: Mystic Transference

Power.Name: Eldritch Shield
Power.Description:
Sorcery
Targets self
Instant

Block Slot Enhancement

Eldritch Shield creates a protective barrier of focused magical energy.

MAINTAIN

  • Self damage reduction with better Non-Physical damage reduction than other Block powers

Adds a different effect to your shield based on which Aura you have active:
  • Aura of Arcane Clarity: Your shield now returns more energy during a block.
  • Aura of Primal Majesty: Your shield now has a chance to strike your attacker with a bolt of lightning.
  • Aura of Ebon Destruction: Your shield now has a chance to Fear your attackers.
  • Aura of Radiant Protection: Your shield now has a chance to place a Heal over Time on you.

Power.Description:
Bestial Supernatural
0.32-0.48 sec

Bestial Fury uses your hands as deadly claws to slash apart your enemies.

CLICK

  • Single target slashing damage

Advantage.Description: Every time you use this ability you have a chance to return a small amount of energy.

Bestial Supernatural
14 energy
0.5 sec

  • Places a 20% damage debuff on the target that persists for 15 seconds. If the affected enemy attacks the taunter, it will quickly reduce this debuff's strength. Conversely, damage the taunter inflicts on the taunted enemy restores the debuff's strength.
  • This advantage Taunts an AI controlled enemy, forcing them to attack you for 4 seconds. All taunts share a 10 second cooldown, and an enemy that has been taunted by any source cannot be taunted again for 10 seconds.
  • Crippling Challenge breaks through blocking and disables it for 10 seconds.

Advantage.Name: Penetrating Strikes

Power.Description:
Bestial Supernatural
24 energy
0-2 sec

Controllable Combat Pet

Command Animals summons two wolves to your side to aid you in your fight.

CHARGE

  • Energy cost for summoning the wolves is equal to your Equilibrium
  • Summoning the wolves will empty your energy pool

TAP

Power.Name: Resurgence
Power.Description:
Supernatural
Targets self
Instant

Self Heal

Resurgence focuses your body's healing power into a quick burst of health.

CLICK

  • Self heal
  • Increases healing per pulse from Regeneration as if you had just taken a significant amount of damage.
  • Can be used while Held
  • Heal scales with your Constitution
  • 90 second Cooldown
  • This power is considered to be an Active Defense Activating this power imposes a 30 second cooldown on all other Active Defenses

Advantage.Description: Using Resurgence while held will help you break free of the hold. Additionally, any time you use Resurgence while under 50% health, you become Enraged or refresh the duration of Enraged.

Power.Name: Aspect of the Bestial
Power.Description:
Bestial Supernatural
Targets self
0.67-2.17 sec

Toggle, Self Buff

You focus on your connection with your Bestial powers, increasing their effect.

TOGGLE

  • Increases Slashing damage you deal
  • Whenever you cause a target to Bleed, you gain a stack of Bestial Strength, which increases all damage you do by 1%. This stacks up to 5 times.

Power.Name: Regeneration
Power.Description:
Supernatural
Instant

Slotted Passive, Self Heal Over Time

Regeneration greatly increases the speed at which you recover from wounds.

SLOTTED PASSIVE

  • Can be slotted in a Defensive or Balanced passive slot
  • Self heal over time
  • Healing scales with your Recovery
  • Damage received increases healing per period up to 250% of normal
  • Healing slowly decreases over time.
  • Exerting yourself by attacking others will also reduce healing per period, but not below the base value.

Power.Name: Supernatural Power
Power.Description:
Supernatural
Instant

Innate Passive, Secondary Energy Unlock

You are able to tap into a nearly limitless pool of energy.

INNATE PASSIVE

  • Does not need to be slotted in order to function
  • Any time you use a Supernatural power that reduces your energy pool to less than 10%, you will gain a burst of energy.

Power.Name: Pestilence
Power.Description:
Supernatural
Affects foe (5 max)
10 foot Sphere

Slotted Passive, Toxic Damage Over Time

You surround yourself in a cloud of unnatural filth, inflicting toxic damage and infesting your foes.

SLOTTED PASSIVEK

  • Can be slotted in an Offensive or Balanced passive power slot
  • Only active while in combat
  • Deals toxic damage over time to enemies within 10 feet. This damage increases as the targets health gets lower.
  • Deals toxic damage over time to targets you attack with ranged powers. This damage increases as the targets health gets lower.
  • Enemies affected by Pestilence receive reduced benefit from healing effects

Power.Description:
Bestial Supernatural
Affects teammate (5 max)
19 energy
25 foot Sphere
0.83 sec

TAP

  • Applies Fear to nearby foes, causing the enemy to cower in your presence and reducing the damage they deal

Infernal Supernatural

Soul Mesmerism attempts to hypnotize your enemy preventing them from making any actions.

CHARGE

  • This power must be charged for at least .5 seconds to have an effect
  • Applies hold to target
  • Hold strength is based on the charge time

Advantage.Name: Accelerated Metabolism
Advantage.Description: Every time you use this ability you have a chance to return a small amount of energy.

Advantage.Name: Glossolalia
Advantage.Description: Your target begins speaking in tongues. Nearby foes take sonic damage over time and have a chance to join in the chant. 20% chance per tick to apply a secondary Soul Mesmerism effect to nearby targets.

Power.Name: Resurgence
Power.Description:
Supernatural
Targets self
Instant

Self Heal

Resurgence focuses your body's healing power into a quick burst of health.

CLICK

  • Self heal
  • Increases healing per pulse from Regeneration as if you had just taken a significant amount of damage.
  • Can be used while Held
  • Heal scales with your Constitution
  • 90 second Cooldown
  • This power is considered to be an Active Defense Activating this power imposes a 30 second cooldown on all other Active Defenses

Advantage.Name: Evanescent Emergence
Advantage.Description: Using Resurgence while help will help you break free of the hold. Additionally, any time you use Resurgence while under 50% health, you become Enraged or refresh the duration of Enraged.

Power.Name: Aspect of the Infernal
Power.Description:
Infernal Supernatural
Targets self
0.67-2.17 sect

Toggle, Self Buff

You focus on your connection with your Infernal powers, increasing their effect.

TOGGLE

  • Increases Toxic damage you deal
  • When you attempt to Knock a target, you gain a stack of Infernal Strength, which increases all damage you do by 1%. This stacks up to 5 times.

Power.Name: Rebirth
Power.Description:
Infernal Supernatural
Targets self
2 sec

Self Recovery and Heal

Rebirth allows you to recover from defeat to take vengeance upon your enemies.

CLICK

  • Instantly recovers the user from defeat with full hit points
  • Defeating critters returns health
  • Increases the damage and resistance of the user
  • Each enemy defeated has a chance of returning energy to the user
  • User takes massive dimensional damage over time

Advantage.Name: Grave Consequences
Advantage.Description: Summons three Zombies to help your return to the land of the living succeed.

Power.Name: Regeneration
Power.Description:
Supernatural
Instant

Slotted Passive, Self Heal Over Time

Regeneration greatly increases the speed at which you recover from wounds.

SLOTTED PASSIVE

  • Can be slotted in a Defensive or Balanced passive slot
  • Self heal over time
  • Healing scales with your Recovery
  • Damage received increases healing per period up to 250% of normal
  • Healing slowly decreases over time.
  • Exerting yourself by attacking others will also reduce healing per period, but not below the base value.

Power.Name: Supernatural Power
Power.Description:
Supernatural
Instant

Innate Passive, Secondary Energy Unlock

You are able to tap into a nearly limitless pool of energy.

INNATE PASSIVE

  • Does not need to be slotted in order to function
  • Any time you use a Supernatural power that reduces your energy pool to less than 10%, you will gain a burst of energy.

Power.Name: Pestilence
Power.Description:
Supernatural
Affects foe (5 max)
10 foot Sphere

Slotted Passive, Toxic Damage Over Time

You surround yourself in a cloud of unnatural filth, inflicting toxic damage and infesting your foes.

SLOTTED PASSIVEK

  • Can be slotted in an Offensive or Balanced passive power slot
  • Only active while in combat
  • Deals toxic damage over time to enemies within 10 feet. This damage increases as the targets health gets lower.
  • Deals toxic damage over time to targets you attack with ranged powers. This damage increases as the targets health gets lower.
  • Enemies affected by Pestilence receive reduced benefit from healing effects

Statistic.Name: Strength
Statistic.Description: Increases knockback, knockback resistance, breaking from tangible holds, the pick-up and throw ability, and melee damage.

Statistic.Name: Dexterity
Statistic.Description: Improves a hero's critical hit chance and effectiveness of stealth granting powers.

Statistic.Name: Intelligence
Statistic.Description: Affects the damage done by hero's pet, power cooldown length, stealth detection, and the energy cost of their powers.

Statistic.Name: Ego
Statistic.Description: Increases critical hit severity and the ability to breaking from intangible holds.

Statistic.Name: Presence
Statistic.Description: Affects the hero's pet health, the amount a hero heals and the amount of threat they generate (depending on the current role they are using).

Statistic.Name: Recovery
Statistic.Description: Sets the hero's equilibrium and increases rate of energy generated from energy building attacks.

Statistic.Name: Endurance
Statistic.Description: Affects a hero's maximum energy and rate of energy generated from fighting attacks.
